name: Sokovania
description:
Sokovania (pronounced SOKO-VANYA) is a side-scrolling puzzle game with light metroidvania elements. It is an experiment in the expressive potential of its platforming and block-pushing mechanics. Great care has been taken to exclude any extraneous elements and utilize its existing features in new and creative ways.

Available to download, the demo is a a general proof of concept for the gameplay. It includes some tutorial levels and an example of how progression works in the game. The demo's very rough so please excuse any glitches and the general unpolished nature of the thing. If you want to support the game, please send some feedback, queries or interest regarding the demo, the above description or anything else to ianschiffmangames@gmail.com.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - MOVE

Z - UNDO
